sentence: Yesterday, Tom Friedman wrote a piece calling on Joe Biden to replace Kamala Harris with Liz Cheney in the next election.
author: Tucker Carlson
title: Tucker Carlson: Hillary Clinton isn't old news, she may be the future for Democrats

sentence: As I'm charging these self-proclaimed principled conservatives with hypocrisy, an acknowledgement: I disagree with Liz Cheney on most all of these issues; she no doubt considers me a hopeless leftie.
author: Albert Hunt
title: What do Republicans stand for?
